column4: Hi, I'm wondering how browse my camera storage via usb.  I can see and import pictures in F-spot, but I want to see the files and download a video.
it doesn't show up as a removable drive in nautilus?
jussi01 It didn't show up in the "Computer" window with my other drives.  In media I see several folders with "usb" in the name, but none of them have anything in them
but you could still import the photos using f-spot? that's odd
